Writer. Interested in philosophy, history, music, art, poetry, novels, creative non fiction, science, nature, astronomy, psychology, sociology, mythology, movies, comics, and people who are passionate about basically anything (except hurting people, guns, conspiracy fabulism, or atrocity apologism in any direction.)
